TopicTitle: SPH/VAB Hierarchical Craft and Subassembly File Management

Articles.Content: Its a pain to scroll though so many craft and subassembly files. Can you guys enable file system management within the game? Let us create categories of crafts and drag and drop crafts into those categories to save them. Also allow tagging and craft file search function and sorting by create/change timestamp.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66385-Folders-for-Saved-Vehicles?p=914136&viewfull=1#post914136

And just a day or so after I closed one, too. Seriously, there are too many threads for this already. Please use the Search function; a single-word search for "folders" in this section turns up a ton of threads.

/thread.
